synopsis.text: Greek mythology, the cosmos, and a passion for astronomy intertwine in this captivating anime, featuring the work of artist KAGAYA. Once an astronomy-loving boy, KAGAYA now captures the universe, zodiac constellations, and an array of celestial scenes in his art. Immerse yourself in his mesmerizing CG movies, displayed on a fulldome screen, and witness a groundbreaking live-action film of the 2003 total solar eclipse, the first of its kind recorded in Antarctica. Embrace KAGAYA's inspiring message: "Enjoy science and art" and "Chase your dreams!" as you embark on this visual journey through space and time. (Source: KAGAYA Studio)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
